trans-unit.source: Provides a method to resolve relative [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] with respect to the base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a container, such as a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一种方法可以解决相对[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]相对于基[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的容器，如<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BaseUri" name="BaseUri" href=""></xref> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref uid="langword_csharp_BaseUri" name="BaseUri" href=""></xref>附加属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BaseUri" name="BaseUri" href=""></xref> for a specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_BaseUri" name="BaseUri" href=""></xref>指定<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it is implemented or the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.BaseUriHelper.BaseUri%2A> attached property if is set on an element.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法获取<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>如果实现的属性或<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.BaseUriHelper.BaseUri%2A>如果一个元素上设置附加属性。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.BaseUriHelper.BaseUri%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: GetBaseUri will traverse the parent elements of `element` to search for the nearest <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.BaseUriHelper.BaseUri%2A> (<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> or attached property).
trans-unit.target: GetBaseUri 将遍历的父元素`element`要搜索最近<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.BaseUriHelper.BaseUri%2A>(<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext>或附加属性)。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.BaseUriHelper.BaseUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element from which the property value is read.
trans-unit.target: 从中读取属性值的元素。

trans-unit.source: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a given element.
